leadText.title: Registration in URPP/UIS in 1 day
leadText.description: Express accreditation for participation in procurement under 44-FZ, 223-FZ and 615-PP RF

sideCard.title: There is only one registration for trading on 8 federal trading platforms
sideCard.text: According to the requirements of the 504-FZ, registration in URPP is a prerequisite for participation in electronic procedures

cards.text:
To register in URPP, the following documents are required:

— For legal entities — the Charter and the decision to approve the transaction.
— For sole proprietors and individuals — all passport pages.
— For foreign persons — founding documents and their translation into Russian.

A qualified digital signature is also required. We will help you to issue the DS in the correct VC.

To get URPP accreditation, subnit a request in the information system.

Please note: it is better to submit an application a few weeks before the planned tender, since the entire registration process takes up to 16 days.

benefits.title: Professional support in the UIS registration

sideCard.title: We consult and give recommendations during the URPP registration

cards.title: We consult and give recommendations during the preparation of documentation
We check for compliance with the legislation of the Russian Federation of documents and information provided by the Supplier for UIS registration
We are setting up the Supplier's workplace, which is used for registration in the UIS and filling in the registration information

items.text: Submit a request for UIS registration — we will process it within 20 minutes
Pay for the service — the cost of URPP registration is 4990 rub

list.title: You will need
items: Qualified DS in the name of the head of the company — according to the data of the extract of the Unified State Register of Legal Entities
Qualified DSs of employees responsible for procurement: in order to submit an application and participate in the procedures
Power of attorney for employees involved in procurement
Founding documents for legal entities or sole proprietors
A short wait — the time to the required purchase is from 3 to 16 days
Contacts of technical support of Public Services (Gosuslugi), UIS and federal ETPs. It may be necessary to clarify the information during registration
